A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I liked the action sequences but the story is boring\, the Finn-Rose subplot serves no purpose and none of the questions we had at the end of the Force awakens are answered. Like The Force Awakens it is a remake of The Empire Strikes back. We even have Yoda and a traitor. I almost expected the Resistance fleet to hide in a giant asteroid. Disney needs to bring back George Lucas fast because we are now sure to get a remake of Return of the Jed for Episode IXi... with lens flare.
